sentences: Mario Schiano (20 July 1933 in Naples – 10 May 2008 in Rome) was an Italian alto saxophonist and soprano saxophonist associated with avant-garde/free jazz.

A member of the Italian Instabile Orchestra, Schiano recorded with musicians such as Famoudou Don Moye, Eugenio Colombo, Ernst Reijseger, Paul Rutherford, Gianluigi Trovesi and Joëlle Léandre, among others.
Benefit Concert to Repurchase the Pendulum for Mr. Foucault (1989)
And So On (1992, with Ernst Reijseger
She Was Sitting in the First Row (1994)
Fluxus: Instant Soundtrack for a Silent Movie (1999)
Live in Noci and Rive-De Gier.
w/ Elio Martusciello and Maurizio Martuscielo
Mario Schiano; Giancarlo Schiaffini; Bruno Tommaso; Sebi Tramontana (2002).
